title: Erro, Navarre
text:
Erro (<a href="Standard%20Basque">standard basque</a>: "Erroibar"; Erro <a href="Basque%20language">basque</a>: "Erroiberra") is a town and <a href="Municipalities%20of%20Spain">municipality</a> located in the province and autonomous community of <a href="Navarra">Navarra</a>, northern <a href="Spain">Spain</a>.
Its capital is <a href="Lintzoain">Lintzoain</a>.
